Mangoaela grew up in [[Lesotho]] (called ''Basutoland'' at the time) and went to the Basutoland Training College. == Works == * ''Lithoko tsa Marena a Basotho'' (The praise poems of the [[Basotho]] kings), published 1921 * ''Har'a libatana le linyamatsane'' (Among the predators and the prey) * Co-authored ''Grammar of the Sesuto language. Bantu studies Vol. III.''
